body_text:
Anime about kilings in a virtual reality games My boyfriend and I watched this anime about three worlds owned by different people and they were getting killed. There is this girl who is a cop and she was friends with one of the owners of a virtual world because they went to the same high school. The character from her world was like a dead cat.
She threw a party inviting the other world owners because they were in a competition to see who had the most followers. In that competition, the girl cop was trying to find out who the killer was. 
The anime is not Sword Art Online.
